org.sakaiproject.authz.api

Interface SecurityService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoSecurity, SakaiSecurity, SakaiSecurityTest

    public interface SecurityService

    SecurityService is the interface for Sakai security services.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SERVICE_NAME
      This string can be used to find the service in the service manager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAdvisors()
      Deprecated.  
      void clearUserEffectiveRole(String azGroupId)
      Clear the current user's effective role in this authz group.
      void clearUserEffectiveRoles()
      Clear all effective roles for this user.
      String getUserEffectiveRole(String azGroupId)
      Get the current user's effective role in this authz group for security lookups in this session.
      boolean hasAdvisors()
      Check if there are any security advisors stacked for this thread.
      boolean isSuperUser()
      Is this a super special super (admin) user?
      boolean isSuperUser(String userId)
      Is this user a super special super (admin) user?
      SecurityAdvisor popAdvisor()
      Deprecated. 
      for safety use popAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor) to ensure you remove the correct advisor
      SecurityAdvisor popAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor advisor)
      Remove the designated SecurityAdvisor from the top of the Stack
      void pushAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor advisor)
      Establish a new SecurityAdvisor for this thread, at the top of the stack (it gets first dibs on the answer).

      Set the current user's effective role in this authz group for security lookups in this session.

      Can the current session user unlock the lock for use with this resource?

      Can the specificed user id unlock the lock for use with this resource?

      Can the specificed user unlock the lock for use with this resource?

      Access the List of Users who can unlock the lock for use with this resource.

    • Field Detail

      • SERVICE_NAME

        static final String SERVICE_NAME
        This string can be used to find the service in the service manager.

    • Method Detail

      • unlock

        boolean unlock(String lock,
             String reference)
        Can the current session user unlock the lock for use with this resource?
        Parameters:
        lock - The lock id string.
        reference - The resource reference string.
        Returns:
        true, if the user can unlock the lock, false otherwise.

      • unlock

        boolean unlock(User user,
             String lock,
             String reference)
        Can the specificed user unlock the lock for use with this resource?
        Parameters:
        user - The user.
        lock - The lock id string.
        reference - The resource reference string.
        Returns:
        true, if the user can unlock the lock, false otherwise.

      • unlock

        boolean unlock(String userId,
             String lock,
             String reference)
        Can the specificed user id unlock the lock for use with this resource?
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id.
        lock - The lock id string.
        reference - The resource reference string.
        Returns:
        true, if the user can unlock the lock, false otherwise.

      • unlock

        boolean unlock(String userId,
             String lock,
             String reference,
             Collection<String> authzGroupIds)
        Can the specified user id unlock the lock for use with this resource (using these authzGroups for the check)?
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id.
        lock - The lock id string.
        reference - The resource reference string.
        authzGroupIds - The set of authz group ids to use for the check (the reference is not consulted).
        Returns:
        true, if the user can unlock the lock, false otherwise.

      • unlockUsers

        List<User> unlockUsers(String lock,
                     String reference)
        Access the List of Users who can unlock the lock for use with this resource.
        Parameters:
        lock - The lock id string.
        reference - The resource reference string.
        Returns:
        A List (User) of the users can unlock the lock (may be empty).

      • isSuperUser

        boolean isSuperUser()
        Is this a super special super (admin) user?
        Returns:
        true, if the user is a cut above the rest, false if a mere mortal.

      • isSuperUser

        boolean isSuperUser(String userId)
        Is this user a super special super (admin) user?
        Parameters:
        userId - The user to test.
        Returns:
        true, if this user is a cut above the rest, false if a mere mortal.

      • pushAdvisor

        void pushAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor advisor)
        Establish a new SecurityAdvisor for this thread, at the top of the stack (it gets first dibs on the answer).
        Parameters:
        advisor - The advisor to establish

      • popAdvisor

        SecurityAdvisor popAdvisor()
        Deprecated. for safety use popAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor) to ensure you remove the correct advisor
        Remove one SecurityAdvisor from the stack for this thread, if any exist.
        Returns:
        advisor The advisor popped of, or null if the stack is empty.

      • popAdvisor

        SecurityAdvisor popAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor advisor)
        Remove the designated SecurityAdvisor from the top of the Stack
        Parameters:
        advisor -
        Returns:
        the SecurityAdvisor or null if the passed security advisor is not at the top of the stack

      • hasAdvisors

        boolean hasAdvisors()
        Check if there are any security advisors stacked for this thread.
        Returns:
        true if some advisors are defined, false if not.

      • clearAdvisors

        void clearAdvisors()
        Deprecated. 
        Remove any SecurityAdvisors from this thread. WARNING:This method should not be used as it removes all security advisors, not only the one from the calling method rather use popAdvisor()

      • setUserEffectiveRole

        boolean setUserEffectiveRole(String azGroupId,
                           String role)
        Set the current user's effective role in this authz group for security lookups in this session.
        Parameters:
        azGroupId - The authz group id
        role - The role id to assume (must be a valid role in the authz group)
        Returns:
        true, if the user can switch roles in this authz group and the role is set, otherwise false.

      • getUserEffectiveRole

        String getUserEffectiveRole(String azGroupId)
        Get the current user's effective role in this authz group for security lookups in this session.
        Parameters:
        azGroupId - The authz group id
        Returns:
        The user's effective role if set, otherwise null

      • clearUserEffectiveRole

        void clearUserEffectiveRole(String azGroupId)
        Clear the current user's effective role in this authz group.
        Parameters:
        azGroupId - The authz group id

      • clearUserEffectiveRoles

        void clearUserEffectiveRoles()
        Clear all effective roles for this user. Should be called on logout.
